special_text:
[+1]: Scry 2.
[-2]: Exile up to three cards from your hand face down, then draw that many cards. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order. 
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile the top card of your library. If you exile a nonland card this way, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.”
